title: Teleportation-Based Global Logistics Network by 2026
summary: Build a worldwide logistics network using quantum teleportation to move physical goods instantly between hubs within 12 months. Requires room-temperature, lossless quantum teleportation of macroscopic objects, perfect matter reassembly, and negligible energy overhead. Target launch in 2026 with consumer-grade teleport booths in major cities.

title: Mass-Deploy Room-Temperature Superconductor Power Lines Worldwide in 6 Months
summary: Replace all national transmission infrastructure with room-temperature, ambient-pressure superconducting cables manufactured at global scale within six months, eliminating electrical losses entirely. Assumes mature materials that do not yet exist, zero permitting delays, and immediate factory build-out.
